title: Closing the Gap
creator_contributor_role: Chelsea Studios for the Education Department of Victoria, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teachers and community
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Parent participation
description: Episode of Series "Changes...From the Inside". Devised by Glenn and Les Mack for the Supplementary Grants Program of Victoria. Raises issues of concern for those attempting to bridge the gap between schools and the local community. Depicts the first tentative steps of a small inner-city secondary school. Filmed at the historic, heritage registered building on City Road, Southbank, formerly the J.H. Boyd Girls' High School, now (2017) known as the 'Boyd Community Hub'.
